scripts.test:all: npm run test:ingestor && npm run test:enrichment && npm run test:rent-estimator && npm run test:underwriting && npm run test:alerts && npm run test:api-gateway && npm run test:integration
scripts.install:services: cd ingestor && npm install && cd ../enrichment && npm install && cd ../rent-estimator && npm install && cd ../underwriting && npm install && cd ../alerts && npm install && cd ../api-gateway && npm install && cd ../integration-tests && npm install && cd ../demo-web && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd ingestor && npm run build && cd ../enrichment && npm run build && cd ../rent-estimator && npm run build && cd ../underwriting && npm run build && cd ../alerts && npm run build && cd ../api-gateway && npm run build
scripts.dev:all: npm run docker:up && sleep 5 && concurrently "npm run dev:ingestor" "npm run dev:enrichment" "npm run dev:rent-estimator" "npm run dev:underwriting" "npm run dev:alerts"
scripts.docker:up: cd ingestor && docker compose up -d && cd ../enrichment && docker compose up -d && cd ../rent-estimator && docker compose up -d && cd ../underwriting && docker compose up -d && cd ../alerts && docker compose up -d
scripts.docker:down: cd ingestor && docker compose down && cd ../enrichment && docker compose down && cd ../rent-estimator && docker compose down && cd ../underwriting && docker compose down && cd ../alerts && docker compose down
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf shared-utils/node_modules shared-utils/dist && rm -rf ingestor/node_modules ingestor/dist && rm -rf enrichment/node_modules enrichment/dist && rm -rf rent-estimator/node_modules rent-estimator/dist && rm -rf underwriting/node_modules underwriting/dist && rm -rf alerts/node_modules alerts/dist && rm -rf integration-tests/node_modules integration-tests/dist
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  npm run setup:demo           - Complete demo setup with data pipeline' && echo '  npm run test:all             - Run all tests' && echo '  npm run test:<service>       - Test individual service' && echo '  npm run dev:all              - Start all services in dev mode' && echo '  npm run dev:<service>        - Start individual service' && echo '  npm run dev:api-gateway      - Start API Gateway (http://localhost:8080)' && echo '  npm run dev:demo             - Start demo GUI (http://localhost:3000)' && echo '  npm run start:alerts-dev    - Start alerts dev server (http://localhost:8082)' && echo '  npm run clean                - Remove all node_modules and build artifacts' && echo '  npm run docker:up/down       - Manage Docker services'
